languages.text: "Возможно, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксенос{/g} Ирлиэт сможет что-то поведать вам о том, что это за место. В конце концов, она каким-то образом родственна тем, кто здесь обитает... и повинна в том, что мы с вами находимся здесь сейчас". {n}Абеляр умолкает, однако в его глазах легко прочитать все, что он думает о возвращении эльдарки в ряды ваших спутников.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксенос{/g} Ирлиэт сможет что-то поведать вам о том, что это за место. В конце концов, она каким-то образом родственна тем, кто здесь обитает... и повинна в том, что мы с вами находимся здесь сейчас". {n}Абеляр умолкает, однако в его глазах легко прочитать все, что он думает о возвращении эльдарки в ряды ваших спутников.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "It is possible the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} Yrliet could tell you something about this place. After all, she is in some way related to its denizens... and she is responsible for the fact that we are here at all." {n}Abelard falls silent, but his eyes make it clear what he thinks of the Aeldari's return to the ranks of your companions.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Возможно, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксенос{/g} Ирлиэт сможет что-то поведать вам о том, что это за место. After all, she is in some way related to its denizens... and she is responsible for the fact that we are here at all." {n}Abelard falls silent, but his eyes make it clear what he thinks of the Aeldari's return to the ranks of your companions.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “或许{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}伊莉耶特可以告诉你这个地方的事情。毕竟，她在某种程度上，与这个地方的住民有联系……而且我们之所以会落到在这种地方，她负有不可推卸的责任。”{n}阿贝拉德没再说什么，但他的眼神清楚地表明他对伊莉耶特归队这件事情的看法。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is possible the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} Yrliet could tell you something about this place. After all, she is in some way related to its denizens... and she is responsible for the fact that we are here at all." {n}Abelard falls silent, but his eyes make it clear what he thinks of the Aeldari's return to the ranks of your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “或许{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}伊莉耶特可以告诉你这个地方的事情。毕竟，她在某种程度上，与这个地方的住民有联系……而且我们之所以会落到在这种地方，她负有不可推卸的责任。”{n}阿贝拉德没再说什么，但他的眼神清楚地表明他对伊莉耶特归队这件事情的看法。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is possible the xenos Yrliet could tell you something about this place. After all, she is in some way related to its denizens... and she is responsible for the fact that we are here at all." {n}Abelard falls silent, but his eyes make it clear what he thinks of the Aeldari's return to the ranks of your companions.{/n}

languages.text: «Tal vez la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, Yrliet, pueda decirle algo sobre el lugar. A fin de cuentas, está relacionada con sus habitantes de alguna manera... y es responsable de que estemos aquí en primer lugar». {n}Abelard guarda silencio, pero su mirada deja claro lo que piensa del regreso de la Aeldari a las filas de tus acompañantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is possible the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} Yrliet could tell you something about this place. After all, she is in some way related to its denizens... and she is responsible for the fact that we are here at all." {n}Abelard falls silent, but his eyes make it clear what he thinks of the Aeldari's return to the ranks of your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, Yrliet, pueda decirle algo sobre el lugar. A fin de cuentas, está relacionada con sus habitantes de alguna manera... y es responsable de que estemos aquí en primer lugar». {n}Abelard guarda silencio, pero su mirada deja claro lo que piensa del regreso de la Aeldari a las filas de tus acompañantes.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}ユリエットなら、この場所について何か教えてくれるかもしれません。やはり、彼女はここの住人となんらかの関係があるようですから…そして、我々がここにいるのも、彼女のせいなのです」{n}アベラルドは黙り込んだが、その目はアエルダリが仲間に戻っったことについてどう思っているかを雄弁に物語っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is possible the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} Yrliet could tell you something about this place. After all, she is in some way related to its denizens... and she is responsible for the fact that we are here at all." {n}Abelard falls silent, but his eyes make it clear what he thinks of the Aeldari's return to the ranks of your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}ユリエットなら、この場所について何か教えてくれるかもしれません。やはり、彼女はここの住人となんらかの関係があるようですから…そして、我々がここにいるのも、彼女のせいなのです」{n}アベラルドは黙り込んだが、その目はアエルダリが仲間に戻っったことについてどう思っているかを雄弁に物語っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Möglicherweise könnte die {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} Yrliet Euch etwas darüber sagen. Sie ist schließlich in gewisser Weise mit den Bewohnern verwandt ... und ihr haben wir es zu verdanken, dass wir alle hier sind." {n}Abelard verstummt, doch sein Blick macht deutlich, was er von Aeldaris Rückkehr in die Reihen deiner Gefährten hält.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is possible the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} Yrliet could tell you something about this place. After all, she is in some way related to its denizens... and she is responsible for the fact that we are here at all." {n}Abelard falls silent, but his eyes make it clear what he thinks of the Aeldari's return to the ranks of your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Möglicherweise könnte die {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} Yrliet Euch etwas darüber sagen. Sie ist schließlich in gewisser Weise mit den Bewohnern verwandt ... und ihr haben wir es zu verdanken, dass wir alle hier sind." {n}Abelard verstummt, doch sein Blick macht deutlich, was er von Aeldaris Rückkehr in die Reihen deiner Gefährten hält.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Il est possible que cette {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, Yrliet, ait des informations sur cet endroit. Après tout, elle est liée à ses occupants, d'une manière ou d'une autre... et c'est à cause d'elle que nous sommes ici. » {n}Abélard se tait, mais son regard indique clairement ce qu'il pense du retour de l'Aeldari parmi vos compagnons.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is possible the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} Yrliet could tell you something about this place. After all, she is in some way related to its denizens... and she is responsible for the fact that we are here at all." {n}Abelard falls silent, but his eyes make it clear what he thinks of the Aeldari's return to the ranks of your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il est possible que cette {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, Yrliet, ait des informations sur cet endroit. Après tout, elle est liée à ses occupants, d'une manière ou d'une autre... et c'est à cause d'elle que nous sommes ici. » {n}Abélard se tait, mais son regard indique clairement ce qu'il pense du retour de l'Aeldari parmi vos compagnons.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g} Yrliet'in burayla ilgili bildiği bir şeyler olabilir. Ne de olsa zindanlarıyla bağlantılı sayılır... Burada olmamızın sebebi de zaten kendisi." {n}Abelard sussa da Aeldari'nin geri dönmesiyle ilgili düşünceleri, gözlerinden açıkça okunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is possible the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} Yrliet could tell you something about this place. After all, she is in some way related to its denizens... and she is responsible for the fact that we are here at all." {n}Abelard falls silent, but his eyes make it clear what he thinks of the Aeldari's return to the ranks of your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g} Yrliet'in burayla ilgili bildiği bir şeyler olabilir. Ne de olsa zindanlarıyla bağlantılı saıylır... Burada olmamızın sebebi de zaten kendisi." {n}Abelard sussa da Aeldari'nin geri dönmesiyle ilgili düşünceleri gözlerinden açıkça okunuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
